name: Sonoran Taco Power Bowls
author: HORMEL NATURAL CHOICE
summary: Rice, beans, corn, and zucchini are served in bowls and topped with avocado, radishes and other veggies, salsa and a squeeze of lime juice.
ingredients: 3 slices HORMEL® NATURAL CHOICE® Cherrywood Smoked Uncured Bacon, cut crosswise into 1/2-inch pieces
⅔ cup cooked black or pinto beans
⅔ cup frozen roasted whole kernel corn, thawed
4 ounces HORMEL® NATURAL CHOICE® Smoked Deli Turkey, cut into strips
Salsa fresca or salsa verde (Herdez), if desired
directions: Cook bacon in a large, deep skillet over medium heat until crisp; remove from pan and drain on paper toweling
Add zucchini to skillet; cook and stir over medium-high heat about 3 minutes or until crisp-tender
Add rice, beans, and corn to pan
Cook and stir until heated through
Spoon rice and bean mixture into 2 large bowls
Top with turkey, bacon, avocado, radish, green onion, and cilantro
Top with salsa and a squeeze of lime
